name: Sanji
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn DON!!-1: Activate up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type Event card from your hand with an original cost of 3 or less. When Attacking If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
